testCaseDescription: Validate repository visibility settings during and after creation

testSteps.Step_Desc: Login to GitHub with valid credentials.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository is created with the selected visibility (Public/Private) and the visibility setting is correctly reflected post-creation.
Repository is created with the selected visibility (Public/Private) and the visibility setting is correctly reflected post-creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Verify that the created repository is marked as 'Public'.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository is created with the selected visibility (Public/Private) and the visibility setting is correctly reflected post-creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Repeat steps 2-6, but select 'Private' as the visibility option and verify the repository is marked as 'Private'.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository is created with the selected visibility (Public/Private) and the visibility setting is correctly reflected post-creation.
